ğŸ–¼ï¸ Create Blog Thumbnails Easily with EzThumb!

One of the most important elements when writing a blog post is an eye-catching thumbnail image. Thumbnails are a crucial factor in encouraging visitors to click on your article. This Chrome extension helps you easily create the perfect thumbnail for your blog posts.

â­ Key Features:

1. Text Input: The text you enter will automatically adjust to fit the thumbnail based on line breaks.
2. Border Customization: Choose from multiple border styles and change them with just a click.
3. Color Customization: Modify text, background, and border colors using the color palette provided.
4. Font Selection: Select from various fonts with a simple click to change the style.
5. Background Upload: If you want to use an image as your background instead of a solid color, you can upload it. You can also apply a blur effect using the check button next to the upload option.
6. Text Border: Click the button next to the text slider to apply a border around the text.
7. Template Save: You can save and load your last template with the buttons, SAVE and LOAD.
8. Image Save: Once your thumbnail is ready, save the image and upload it directly to your blog!

â­ How to Use:

1. Install the EzThumb Chrome extension.
2. Open a new tab in your Chrome browser and click the extension.
3. Customize the text and image elements to create your unique thumbnail.
4. Once you're satisfied with the design, click the SAVE button. You can use it directly on your blog!

Now, with EzThumb, you can easily create stunning thumbnails every time you finish writing a blog post! Make your blog stand out with attractive thumbnails that grab your readers' attention.
